cognitive-folding

Fold-engine treats JSON as a bounded cognitive surface rather than an infinite tree. The goal is to keep attention in a small, meaningful window while keeping the rest of the set reachable.

Cognitive anchors

  • Working memory constraints (4Â±1 items)
  • Executive function and attention gating
  • Determinism over novelty

JSON lens

  • Unknown JSON is still navigable through schema-bound projections.
  • jq/jaq select structure; folds bound attention.
